FrageText.de: Warum werden Sie hier die Geschwindigkeit verringern?
FrageText.en: Why will you reduce your speed here?

de.Text: Weil ich mich einem schlecht einsehbaren Schutzweg nähere
Weil nach dem Schutzweg eine unübersichtliche Kurve folgt
Weil der Nachkommende zu knapp auffährt

en.Text: Because I am approaching a pedestrian crossing that is not clearly in view
Because there is a curve that is not completely in view immediately after the pedestrian crossing
Because I am currently being overtaken
Because the vehicle behind me is driving too close to me

hr.Text: Jer se približavam slabo uočlivom obilježenom pješačkom prijelazu
Jer iza obilježenog pješačkog prijelaza slijedi nepregledan zavoj
Jer me drugo vozilo upravo pretječe
Jer vozilo otraga vozi preblizu meni

sl.Text: Ker se približujem slabo preglednemu prehodu za pešce
Ker za prehodom za pešce sledi nepregledni ovinek
Ker vozilo za mano vozi preblizu

tr.Text: Çünkü iyi görünmeyen bir yaya geçidine yaklaşıyorum
Çünkü yaya geçidinden sonra önü görünmeyen bir viraj geliyor
Çünkü arkadan gelen çok yakın takip ediyor
